message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a unique opportunity to own a high-quality item that will meet your needs. I'm willing to sell it to you for $14,000. This is a great deal, considering its value to you is $12,000. I'm confident you'll love it!

Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the quality of the product, $14,000 is a bit too steep for me. I'm willing to pay $11,500 for it. This would still be a good deal for you, as it's above your valuation.  Let me know what you think.

Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand that $11,500 is a bit lower than my initial offer, but I'm willing to compromise. I can do $13,000 for the product. This is still a good deal for both of us, considering its value to you is $12,000. Let me know if this is something you'd be interested in.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $13,000 is still a bit high for me.  I'm willing to meet you halfway at $12,500. This would still be a fair price for both of us, given the product's value.  Let's see if we can finalize this deal.

I understand that $12,500 is a good compromise, Bob, but I'm still not willing to go that low. I can do $12,800 for the product, which is closer to my initial offer. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to you. Let me know if this is something you'd be interested in.
Alice, I'm getting closer to your price, but $12,800 is still a bit too much for me. I'm willing to go up to $12,600, which is just $200 away from your last offer. Let's close this deal.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Bob. I'm willing to consider your offer, but I'm still not willing to go below $13,000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to you. Let me know if you're willing to meet me at $13,000.
